DOC.detailed_description: The current study run alongside externally fund project measure physical activity level patient bronchiectasis ( ClinicalTrials.gov ID : NCT01569009 ) . In order fully understand physical activity behaviour bronchiectasis , important compare pattern physical activity , exercise capacity quality life patient bronchiectasis healthy age-matched population . For healthy population similar age patient bronchiectasis , little applicable research currently exist regard normative value physical activity sedentary behaviour . In particular study , measure physical activity level healthy individual age-matched patient bronchiectasis . The commonly used questionnaire assess physical activity International Physical Activity Questionnaire . Pedometers inexpensive device use assess daily step count time spend walk . Activity monitor expensive require technical expertise analysis interpretation . However , provide in-depth information pattern , quantity intensity activity include daily sedentary time . In study , investigator use ActiGraph activity monitor , ActivPAL activity monitor , DigiWalker pedometer IPAQ measure physical activity level healthy individual age-matched patient bronchiectasis . This study focus participant engage high level physical activity unlikely represent physical activity level patient bronchiectasis . This study include Modified Shuttle Test . Understanding healthy individual ' perspective readiness change physical activity behaviour link important outcome help inform future physical activity intervention .
